p: White opaque 96-well Nunclon (Thermo Scientific 165306) plates were coated overnight at 4°C with 5 μg/mL A/California/07/2009(H1N1) NYMC X-179A (NIBSC 09/174). Sample dilutions of nanobody-Fc ranging from 10 μg/mL to 0.25 ng/mL were made and ADCC Reporter Bioassay was then carried out as per manufacturer’s instructions (Promega M1201) and read using the GloMax Navigator (Promega).
